website_summaries.verdict: One of the better multi-purpose lights you can use for illumination on a boat.
pros: Large LEDs do a good job of creating a floodlight-like effect that shines brightly at night
Can be mounted on a variety of vehicles like boats, trucks, and more
cons: Mounting brackets can be difficult to secure on some curved or vertical surfaces

customer_reviews.title: Amazing deal for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I put this on my front bumper which is a ranch hand of a 2003 Ford Excursion I hooked it to a foot dimmer switch from an old style vehicle and put a fuse holder in the hot line to the battery and use the ground for the switch. I use it for my high beams and my goodness what an amazing difference even in the rain I can see the road CLEARLY!!!
customer_reviews.author: CharlieMJr

customer_reviews.title: Great set of lights.
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. Put them on my 02' Polaris Sportsman in place of the factor lights. Almost fit on there own, had to make up a small stand off, but was well worth the effort. They light the whole yard no problem. Nice wide beam with the floods and great distance with the spots, I did wire them together so the flood and spots are on together. They appear to be well constructed and look like they should be able to take the abuse. The only issue I had was the machining and fit of the supplied bracket and mounting block very tight fit and hard to get the bolts started, but that is all. We'll worth the $$$$.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good lights, crappy mounts
customer_reviews.text: The lights are bright and do their job, but the mounts could use a little tweaking. The block that you mount to the light is attached with an allen screw. If you tighten it down all the way it prevents complete rotation of the half moon swivel that rotates the light up and down. I ordered two of the 4" work lights and two of the 6" headlights. The 4" were not as bad as the 6" to get right. I wound up using a washer as a spacer between the block and the light so that I could get it tight. Very little instructions were included. As with most things, more money spent gets more quality control.
customer_reviews.author: SRTCpt

customer_reviews.title: UM...can you say BRIGHT?!?!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty awesome. I purchased this as a replacement to my headlights when I have the snow plow mounted. It took some time to custom mount the thing but the performance is quite unreal. I took it out at night and it lit up my entire block. Needless to say...it's probably not street legal but this turns the night into day. It comes only with the light so you will have to buy a switch and relay. I've seen many other lights bars with less performance and for more money. The quality seems rugged and should hold up to the elements. I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Joshua Katz

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the wiring harness with the built-in relay, along with two lights of these lights. I use these lights on my jeep at a hunting lease so I wired the spot and fog beams together. These lights are extremely bright and surpassed my expectations. The quality of the construction materials on the lights and the harness are top-notch. Very pleased with my purchase. So much better than the old halogen KC's that were on there before.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are still working, after about 7 months of ...
customer_reviews.text: These are still working, after about 7 months of use. I didn't want to review them without using them over a duration. For the price they are a decent deal. They are; however, not safe for on-road use. The reflector housings do not direct light in a "spot" pattern - these cast more at a 70+ degree angle. I have rotated mine from being on my front bumper, to use as backup lights. They are effective for that use.
customer_reviews.author: J. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Best light for your money!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok ok don't let the cheap price fool you , this light is very well made. The hardware included is excellent and you can tell it was built to last. The light it's self is not all that big but holy cow it throws out some light.. I installed mine on a dirt bike last week and I could not be happier way way better then a trailtech or a factory style headlight. No switch included but there is enough wire to splice in, also the blue wire and red wire control the 2 halfs of the light , so I have high and low on a switch... great lil light will be buying more!!
customer_reviews.author: MR_TAZ

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy construction
customer_reviews.text: Much heavier duty than I imagined for the price. Installed on my Gobi rack easily using LAMPHUS 2PC Off-Road LED Light Bar 0.75"/1"/1.25" Horizontal Bar Clamp Mounting Kit (which are also super sturdy). Light is incredibly bright and caused no significant increase in wind noise.
customer_reviews.author: PAHunter

customer_reviews.title: Great light bar for the price!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love how bright these are and how thick the wiring is. Mounted up easily to my brush guard on my 97 Explorer 5.0 and will be purchasing their 36" light bar soon for my roof rack and can't wait to have it all mounted up as I know it's gonna be a thing of beauty. My 20" is super bright and I couldn't believe the great price and have had it on my vehicle for months now and it's been rained on and hailed on and no damage to it at all. Very please and will be buying more light bars soon from Lamphus.
customer_reviews.author: David_KCMO

customer_reviews.title: High Quality and Bright
customer_reviews.text: Very bright and high quality. The brackets are industrial and easy to mount. The entire product is very high quality. The light spectrum is very white (not yellow), but definitely not yet blue. Using these on a fishing boat for deck light floods.
customer_reviews.author: trent richardson

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: The 12 inch light is bright and has a heavy duty appearance. It does have some weight to it which doesn’t bother me. I have used it multiple times already and I am impressed with the amount of light this product puts out compared to my Auxbeam 12 inch led bar this product replaced. Now time will tell if it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian K.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice LED light bar for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Put thus on my duck hunting boat. It does a great job of lighting things up at night. My only complaint is that it takes loosening 8 separate 10mm bolts to adjust the angle. Worked with no issues all year. I've paired it with 2 of the 4 inch Lamphus fog lights. These got me to my duck hole one very foggy morning. Love them now I have them adjusted correctly.
customer_reviews.author: RussellM

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Gasket on the from of light needs some silicone to keep the water out
customer_reviews.author: Alexander A.

customer_reviews.title: First light that was sent to me was defective
customer_reviews.text: The first one I bought , a section of the lights would not come on. I wanted to just exchange the light but instead i had to be refunded and then buy the light again. The new one works, I hope it works for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Hilton V.

customer_reviews.title: I love it, it's incredibly bright at night and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I actually replaced my Harley Iron 883 headlight with this. It was tricky, but in the end we didn't even need to replace the stock "eyebrow", the part above the headlight that holds everything in. I love it, it's incredibly bright at night and I know people see me, which on an all black Harley is important.
customer_reviews.author: Noah Sleiman

customer_reviews.title: Bright Bright Bright and made very well.
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well on my can am defender, Bright as hell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the $$
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I ordered the 36" about 4 months ago and finally got around to installing it on my 2018 Jeep Compass Trailhawk. I mounted it to a roof basket and am very pleased with the light it throws out. I wish I had installed it sooner! The photos do not do this thing justice!
customer_reviews.author: Jake K.

customer_reviews.title: Good price for good lights
customer_reviews.text: The lights are great the only issue that I had was all the mounting equipment wasn't there so I makeshifted my own. But so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Roam

customer_reviews.title: Bright and practical
customer_reviews.text: These were easy to install and have worked wonderfully. I purchased amber lense covers so I can use them as driving or fog lights. Very good quality. I would definitely buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: Puddin Tame

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably priced for good performance
customer_reviews.text: Bar feels nicely constructed. I have used lamphus products in the past with good success. Wiring is set up with a negative and two positive leads, suppose you could install a switch for floods and one for spot. Mounts are easy to adjust to fit in tight spots.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Gales

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: 1 of the 4 has different mounting hardware than the others. Regular head bolts instead of allen bolts. But more importantly I only have had time to mount 2 of these so far and after just one little rain there is already condensation inside the light. Another Chinese knockoff failure.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Awesome LED lights!
customer_reviews.text: These are great lights. I don't now about the other reviews but I washed mine with a high-pressure washer and had no problem with water entry. I have two installed side by side on my Tacoma and as other reviewers have stated, they are plenty bright and I get lights flashed at me even in the day. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jessika

customer_reviews.title: when I first bought this light kit I was very happy. But in less than a year I have ...
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying, when I first bought this light kit I was very happy. But in less than a year I have moisture behind the lens and it looks really bad. (I will post a picture soon). Yes it still works, but as we all know, water and electronic don't mix, so it's just a matter of time before I have to replace it. As for the ease of installation, I installed it with no problem, the instructions were good and all the parts were there, so no complaints. But water behind the lens only means one thing.....replacement!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Porchet

customer_reviews.title: Pretty bright
customer_reviews.text: I was sceptical of this light at first but for the price you really cant beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Gary

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Retrofit cfr 250r with trailtech startor and wires/rectifier etc, flywheel came from 450r, then mounted light on front tree using swivel bracket that came with light. Light output is impressive!
customer_reviews.author: Doode

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, Beefy Lights
customer_reviews.text: The lights arrived quick! These are some heavy duty lights, especially with the all metal casing. I was able to mount them just the way I needed because it allows you to adjust in any position. There's no difference in spot or flood light, but they are bright and light up the area you need. I use them as driving lights and aim them down so that they don't blind oncoming traffic. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Dudeist

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This item is subpar at best. I’ve had the lights installed on my boat for a week now and one of the light seals obviously was installed improperly at the factory, because the light is full of moisture. Now when it’s on the light strength is about 1/1000th of what it should be. The other light works fine... thus far. Don’t buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Buying stuff

customer_reviews.title: the build quality is good and the fasteners are stainless
customer_reviews.text: i put 3 of these on my jeep and i'll say for the price i was pleasantly surprised. the build quality is good and the fasteners are stainless. i have 2 floods and one spot beam, the floods throw light everywhere and the spot isn't a pencil beam by any stretch but most of the light is in a soft 2.5' circle at 25 feet. the weatherpak connectors were a nice add on
customer_reviews.author: yota924x4

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, sturdy, handsome, aluminum case and it's amazingly bright! Really bright! I didn't need to buy any of the suggested switch kits, I just went to an Auto Zone store and got a switch and the wire I needed to go to a power source. Looks fantast mounted up on the front of the roof rack on my Dodge Durango!
customer_reviews.author: George B.

customer_reviews.title: I put the 20" light bar on a Polaris Ranger ...
customer_reviews.text: I put the 20" light bar on a Polaris Ranger. In March of 2016 we flooded with 5' of water and 10 kts of current head on to the light. I figured it was done. After getting the Ranger back from the mechanics, I flipped the switch not thinking the light would work. Not only did it work, it worked till I traded the Ranger 9 months later. My wife has a Rigid on her Ranger and it fogs up. Rigid says that is normal and would not replace.
customer_reviews.author: RHETT J MEYERS

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed. I have RIGID lights on the rear of my truck. Tried these out on the front and they are almost as good. The linkage to the mounting bracket isn't very solid...that's my only complaint. Lights are really bright!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Great, Bright, and a good Price!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is bright and it works great! I had to make some home made brackets to mount in firmly on my 2006 F350. The light works great once you get it adjusted to the right position but before you tighten it down make sure you adjust it because it is difficult to adjust afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Loud!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I installed this light bar to a sand rail. This Light Bar Whistles in the wind so loud, I have to wear earplugs.
customer_reviews.author: P. Nav

customer_reviews.title: L.E.D.'s are for me !
customer_reviews.text: LED's are in, these will be going in my 2011 Silverado 4x4. This equipment does not feel like a toy. It's heavy aluminum, sturdy with cooling fins. I'm thinking of using a relay to power these. just to be in the safe side. I have no regrets with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: rina garza

customer_reviews.title: Bright and penatrating light.
customer_reviews.text: Good light, nice and bright mounted to my roof bar.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lights! This is a bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Awesome lights! This is a bang for your buck! I put these on before a trip to Drummond Island. No need for any other lights, these are amazing! Great product, they have been on my rig for several months now.
customer_reviews.author: Ponemahjohn

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: The product is defective. has been sent for money back
customer_reviews.author: alexander s.

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME, super bright !
customer_reviews.text: This is CRAZY bright ! I'm so glad I purchased it. I'll be getting another for my RV. I like to drive at night, (less traffic, less stress, less people in a hurry.) and having the extra light on hand is great!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Light Bar
customer_reviews.text: Turns night into day. Mounted it to my bull bar on my 2014 Nissan titan and I couldn't ask for anything better. Does exactly what all the three times more expensive rigid bars do, make light. Have not noticed any condensation or any other issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: Brian N

customer_reviews.title: 12 LEDs wont turn on.
customer_reviews.text: Right side flood and 1st set of 6 spot LEDs also on the right side doesn't turn on. On the back one of the cooling fins is bent. Tested it half way to the installation and for $70 was really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described, easy to install and they are bright.
customer_reviews.author: Ken S

customer_reviews.title: Super Bright
customer_reviews.text: Made a trip from Alaska to Alabama. Worked flawlessly the entire trip! Lights up the whole road.
customer_reviews.author: wade claussen

customer_reviews.title: SUPER BRIGHT lights
customer_reviews.text: SUPER BRIGHT lights. I have them mounted on the back of my semi truck to use when I back up my 53 foot semi trailer!! Works ridiculously awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: Chad Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Ok but
customer_reviews.text: These light preform great for the cost. The only reason that i am giving a three star rating is the hot wire for my set of lights was the blue wire and not the red like anyone in there right mind would think it was. This in turn cost me the destruction of the connector that was supplied. My suggestion is to test the hot wire before wiring up the plug so that you do not make the same mistake that I did.
customer_reviews.author: Brett G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice at first.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this last Aug and all was fine until recently. The light fogged up and I had to be disassembled to remove the moisture. This happened in Northern California were we don't get much rain in the first place. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: The Busters

customer_reviews.title: Great lights. More substantial than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Great lights. More substantial than I thought. Bought recommend wiring harness and wiring was straight forward. Mounted on RZR.
customer_reviews.author: Joe G.

customer_reviews.title: Turnin night into day
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I didn't really know what to expect with such a low price. I was blown away. You can't even look at this thing when it's turned on. Super bright, blinding light. From the drivers seat lookin out it's awesome. Lights up the woods like nothing I've seen. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Silly44444

customer_reviews.title: This is nice stuff, great value
customer_reviews.text: This is nice stuff, great value. I suggest get if anyone in between look for LED Lamp for night work, off road activities, camping aswel.
customer_reviews.author: ongard

customer_reviews.title: Great for the woods.
customer_reviews.text: Great light! I've been using it on logging roads and trails in the Pacific Northwest and it is phenomenal. Makes driving late at night much safer, and helps spot the wildlife well before it enters the roadway.
customer_reviews.author: bigroblee

customer_reviews.title: Great light for a great price👍
customer_reviews.text: Old on the left vs lamphus on the right. Awesome upgrade super bright. Great light for the price for sure. Lights up the whole lake at night👍
customer_reviews.author: Eli Rhodehamel

customer_reviews.title: The best light bar!!
customer_reviews.text: The perfect light bar. Works well in the city and in the country. Super clean and bright lighting no matter the conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Eric - Brooklyn NY

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong
customer_reviews.text: Pretty dang good light for the money. Minimal fabrication needed. Wasn’t much of a schematic to wire light for either flood or spot, but I was going for both anyways
customer_reviews.author: Ryan shafer

customer_reviews.title: Opted to get one flood light type and one spot quite happy with both
customer_reviews.text: Top shelf, quick delivery. Opted to get one flood light type and one spot quite happy with both. You will need to get a switch assembly and wiring harness 20 amp fuse if running both lamps off same switch but then you should also use a relay.
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: Great LED for the price
customer_reviews.text: These lights really turn the night to day. I wired mine so the spot and flood come on together. Makes driving the Polaris much safer at night. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Len

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Works. Not sure how long but works out the box.
customer_reviews.author: Ian G

customer_reviews.title: Get it if you want it.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It lights the road up great and its not a bad price for what you get. I have it on my 02 nissan frontier and it fits perfectly on its cargo rack so no drilling into the cab.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan brookshire

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bright light
customer_reviews.text: Super bright. Used on my ATV with extra mounting brackets so I could have a light shine over my snow plow
customer_reviews.author: packerman

customer_reviews.title: I love these lights!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these LED's to put on my Land Master UTV. The OEM lights was not so great. I installed them, and I took my wife for a ride to night, and when I turned them on, we both said, WOW! Sure lights up the night. I couldn't ask for a better set of lights. Mike in Indiana.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: excellent on the windshield post of my TJ
customer_reviews.text: excellent on the windshield post of my TJ. WAY brighter and use less electricity than non LED offroad lights. Easy to install and hold up great in weather!
customer_reviews.author: NOFLO

customer_reviews.title: ... for a couple of months now and it works great. It fit perfect in the front bumper opening ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for a couple of months now and it works great. It fit perfect in the front bumper opening of my 2010 f-150.
customer_reviews.author: Jchan

customer_reviews.title: Put these on the back of my semi truck instead ...
customer_reviews.text: Put these on the back of my semi truck instead of the little 4 inch utility lights that were there. Now I can light up the whole football field. Really well made, Would buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Dave M. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: 000 miles now and I like them better than when installed
customer_reviews.text: Replaced the factory driving lights on my Moto Guzzi Stelvio. 10,000 miles now and I like them better than when installed. Continue to provide a bright white light. Good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: They are bright, but despite the IP67 rating, ...
customer_reviews.text: They are bright, but despite the IP67 rating, one of my lamps is showing condensation inside the glass. And this is on a garage kept vehicle. Not an auspicious start.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: They are as bright as the sun I use them for backup lights. they mount up to my Reese hitch. Good quality
customer_reviews.author: ThekingamI

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install as long as you have auto electronics experience
customer_reviews.text: The light was easy to install on my bumper and is extremely bright. Be warned though, it does not come with any switch or relay and the directions are totally worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Brad N.

customer_reviews.title: Good lights
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, nice & bright.. better than I expected as far as construction & light quality.
customer_reviews.author: Forever Me ;)

customer_reviews.title: I bought switches that looked factory and it worked great. Highly recommend these
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to put behind the grill of my truck and they are extremely bright! They come with all the things needed to wire them up. I bought switches that looked factory and it worked great. Highly recommend these. I drive at night with only these on because they are brighter than my headlights and stock fog lights.
customer_reviews.author: colt1

customer_reviews.title: Great Lights
customer_reviews.text: clear, bright, as described. Will purchase from again and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: fenwicksc

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Delivered as promised. Used as a backup light on a Polaris Ranger Crew. Fantastic illumination when needed. Easy installation. Product looks very well made and cheaper than competition.
customer_reviews.author: DDLC

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quickly, Very well packaged with decent instructions. Well built and super bright! Took about 15 minutes to install, Im very impressed with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rod Swedenborg

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 21 foot Pacific Dory and the results are tremendous. It is like turning the sun back on at midnight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bright!
customer_reviews.text: The lights are very affordable, very bright, look great BUUUUUT!!! How can these guys not Know that Black wires are usually Ground, RED is POWER! The light are wired backwards and cost me a ton of time trying to figure out why they didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Robert I Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Light bar 36 inch
customer_reviews.text: This light is excellent for long range and also lights up the ditches as well. I use it foe off road only for it is so bright. It is out authorized for road\highway usage either. I bought the wiring harness as well and hookup very easy.
customer_reviews.author: terry p.

customer_reviews.title: ... on my Jeep this set for our dodge work great really light up the
customer_reviews.text: Second set one on my Jeep this set for our dodge work great really light up the road
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Better quality control needed
customer_reviews.text: Tried to hook up light and it kept blowing fuses. Found the hot wire inside was pinched against the metal housing. Repaired that and now it works. Seems like a week built light. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a work light for the back of my truck. Works really well and very bright. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: ansari

customer_reviews.title: for my boat!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to mount with the sliding bases. Works perfect on the boat for those late nights on the river spotting banks and floaters.
customer_reviews.author: Fred White

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great light. I installed it on my boat , very bright.
customer_reviews.author: Preston Hance

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome lights. And BRIGHT! I'm so happy with all the lights I've bought from them.
customer_reviews.author: Jim W

customer_reviews.title: Super bright
customer_reviews.text: Great upgrade and are super bright white. Easy install. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I installed them behind the grill of my Silverado. Very bright
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Switzer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: wish could send pic.. now have you lights on truck and all 9 machines i run
customer_reviews.author: David Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Nice and bright
customer_reviews.text: Work great on my tractor. I did have to work on getting the brackets just right to make them work upside down.
customer_reviews.author: Bryon

customer_reviews.title: sweet light bar for my axis wakeboard boat
customer_reviews.text: I put this on my wakeboard tower, lights the lake up good for my late night trips, I can see the driftwood from a long ways away.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Burley

customer_reviews.title: They work excellent and are way brighter than i thought they were ...
customer_reviews.text: They work excellent and are way brighter than i thought they were gonna be and look good on my truck
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: The light is super bright. Needs more spot area less flood
customer_reviews.text: The light is super bright . Needs more spot area less flood . Easy mounting and wiring would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: jeffery davis

customer_reviews.title: Video review in link
customer_reviews.text: For what they are they work great nice and bright having both options is good since it has distance and wide view of lighting. Only cons i have are those wires hopefully the sun don't melt them Heres a Video review copy and paste [...]
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome, water tight so far and it does light ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the front of my duck boat. Works awesome, water tight so far and it does light it up. Bought the accessory wire harness which is a bit combersome but works fine. I always wish for longer cables.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Light were easy to install. Very bright, works well off road.
customer_reviews.author: Richard J. Lishman

customer_reviews.title: Super deal at 1/64 of the cost
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome... Super bright and well made.. Cant beat Cree LEDs.. Came with a Delphi 2 pin weather proof connector which was a plus
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent.
customer_reviews.text: Quality is excellent. I am going to buy the 12" light bar next. I only wish they made a 50" that isn't curved. I was surprised at how good these are. Light output is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Voltdude

customer_reviews.title: Super light
customer_reviews.text: I use it for a rear light on a tractor with a rear snowblower . It is impressive, I can't say how many times better than the old halogen lamp but I doubt if 4 halogen lamps could do nearly as well.
customer_reviews.author: GAH

customer_reviews.title: This light bar is just right for my purpose. ...
customer_reviews.text: This light bar is just right for my purpose. It provides lots of light when I need it and does not draw very much power.
customer_reviews.author: Jim B

customer_reviews.title: FREAKING BRIGHT!!
customer_reviews.text: this thing is FREAKING BRIGHT! Can't use it for my bike to replace it's headlight, state laws updated recently requiring use of a high/low beam function but for a DRL, or a aux High Beam it's simply fantastically bright! Comes with a water resistant connector that you have to add to the unit yourself, use bullet connections or soldier the wire connector on and heat shrink it (better that way). Don't expect to make any friends on the road if you turn this puppy on!
customer_reviews.author: J. deckard

customer_reviews.text: Nice light bar. Very bright. Works on my side by side Great!

product_meta.title: LAMPHUS 2pc CRUIZER 4" 18W LED Flood Light [60 Degree Spread] [Peripheral/Reverse/Work Applications] [IP67] – for Off-Road, Construction, Tow Trucks, Utility Trucks & Marine Use
feature_bullets: INTENSE IMMEDIATE ILLUMINATION - Packing six 3W LEDs for a total of 18W at 6,000K Color Temperature with 1,600 Lumens, this powerful floodlight casts a 60 degree spread for optimal close-distance illumination.
MORE THAN A FLOODLIGHT- Effortlessly mounts on A-pillars; use it for reverse lights or mount on the sides of vehicles to supplement driving lights.

BUILT TO BE RESILIET- An ultra-strong shatter-resistant polycarbonate lens is enshrouded in a die-cast aluminum housing for maximum durability; IP-67 rated for dust and moisture intrusion; stainless steel hardware for superior longevity

PROFESSIONAL OR RECREATIONAL USE - Provides encompassing illumination around immediate vicinities; ideal for lighting up work sites for construction, utility, roadside assistance vehicles; excellent for lighting up boat decks or flatbeds.
INSTALLATION ACCESSORIES INCLUDED - Includes all mounting hardware; swivel mounting brackets allow precise illumination exactly where you need it.
